info.description:
The ELS iSE-Cobra 4 service implements all iSE-Cobra 4 functions for GroupAlarm

# Authentication

<!-- ReDoc-Inject: <security-definitions> -->
info.title: groupalarm ELS iSE-Cobra 4 API

get.description: Returns the requested certificate for the given organizationID

schema.description: Certificate contains all certificates for a given organization

put.description: Store the given certificate for the given organizationID

schema.description: Certificate contains all certificates for a given organization

delete.description: Delete the certificate for the given organizationID

get.description: Returns all or the requested credentials for the given organizationID (and serviceName)

schema.description: Credentials contains a single service's credentials for a given organization

400.description: unable to find organizationID or serviceName

put.description: Store the given credentials for the given organizationID and serviceName

400.description: unable to find organizationID or serviceName

schema.description: Credentials contains a single service's credentials for a given organization

delete.description: Delete the login for the given organizationID and serviceName

400.description: unable to find organizationID or serviceName

get.description: Returns the requested KeywordList for the given organizationID

schema.description: KeywordList represents a list of KeywordScenarios for an organization

items.description: KeywordScenario contains all four keywords, their scenarioIDs and a priority

put.description: Store the given KeywordList for the given organizationID

schema.description: KeywordList represents a list of KeywordScenarios for an organization

items.description: KeywordScenario contains all four keywords, their scenarioIDs and a priority

delete.description: Delete the KeywordList for the given organizationID

get.description: Returns the requested login for the given organizationID

schema.description: Login contains a single organization's login data

put.description: Store the given login for the given organizationID

schema.description: Login contains a single organization's login data

delete.description: Delete the login for the given organizationID

API_Token.description: To use this API, you need an API-Token from the RBAC settings of your GroupAlarm organization. Place the token inside the HTTP-Header `API-Token` for every request, otherwise the API will return an "401 Unauthorized" error for your request.
API_Token.name: API-TOKEN

Personal-Access-Token.description: To use this API, you need a Personal Access Token from your profile settings. Place the token inside the HTTP-Header `Personal-Access-Token` for every request, otherwise the API will return an "401 Unauthorized" error for your request.
Personal-Access-Token.name: Personal-Access-Token

AccessAllowedResponse.description: AccessAllowedResponse contains whether the organization allows access or not

Alarm.description: This is used for the interaction with alarms
Alarm.title: Alarm describes an alarm payload

endDate.description: time where this event was closed

name.description: user given name for this event

scheduledEndtime.description: time this event is scheduled for close

feedback.description: all feedback payloads for all notified users

feedbackPercentage.description: FeedbackPercentage describes the percentage of an alarm feedback

isDemo.description: demo alarms/organizations use a demo algorithm for positioning

optionalContent.description:
PropertyMap is used as container for additional data in alarms or messages
it can be stored and retrieved easily in our Postgres database

organizationID.description: id of organization for this alarm/event

success.description: successful alarm; true, when all positions are fulfilled

AlarmCreationRequest.description: This is used for an alarm creation
AlarmCreationRequest.title: AlarmCreationRequest defines an alarm creation payload

eventName.description: Name of an event; if event name is passed, a new event will be created with the passed name

items.description: This is used for an alarm creation
items.title: AlarmCreationRequestLabel defines an alarm creation label payload

optionalContent.description:
PropertyMap is used as container for additional data in alarms or messages
it can be stored and retrieved easily in our Postgres database

organizationID.description: ID of the organization to create the alarm as

AlarmCreationRequestLabel.description: This is used for an alarm creation
AlarmCreationRequestLabel.title: AlarmCreationRequestLabel defines an alarm creation label payload

AlarmID.description: AlarmID contains the id of an alarm

AlarmList.description: This is used for an alarm creation
AlarmList.title: AlarmList defines an alarm list payload

totalAlarms.description: amount of alarms inside the payload

AlarmPreview.description: This is used for an alarm-scenario preview
AlarmPreview.title: AlarmPreview defines the alarm preview payload

items.description: Position represents a position in the alarm that is fulfilled by a user

positionsFulfilled.description: indicates that the alarm positions in this preview are fulfilled

AlarmService.description: AlarmService defines all required methods to interact with alarms

AlarmTemplate.description: AlarmTemplate defines an alarm template payload

Certificate.description: Certificate contains all certificates for a given organization

CertificateService.description: CertificateService provides all functions needed to get and store certificates for ISE Cobra services

CredentialService.description: CredentialService provides all functions needed to get and store credentials for ISE Cobra services

Credentials.description: Credentials contains a single service's credentials for a given organization

endDate.description: time where this event was closed

name.description: user given name for this event

scheduledEndtime.description: time this event is scheduled for close

EventCreationItem.description: EventCreationItem is used by the different services to create a new audit-log item

EventList.description: An EventList contains multiple EventListItems and a TotalEvents count used for pagination

items.description: An EventListItem is used as a single audit-log entry in an EventList

user.description: User is a basic copy of user-service's PublicUser

totalEvents.description: total amount of events inside the events array

EventListItem.description: An EventListItem is used as a single audit-log entry in an EventList

user.description: User is a basic copy of user-service's PublicUser

EventService.description: EventService provides all methods needed to list and create audit-log entries

Feature.description: Feature contains all information about a single feature

FeatureIntegration.description: FeatureIntegration contains all data used to integrate our shop with all other services

FeatureRegistryService.description: FeatureRegistryService provides all functions needed to manage a feature registry

FeedbackPercentage.description: FeedbackPercentage describes the percentage of an alarm feedback

KeywordList.description: KeywordList represents a list of KeywordScenarios for an organization

items.description: KeywordScenario contains all four keywords, their scenarioIDs and a priority

KeywordScenario.description: KeywordScenario contains all four keywords, their scenarioIDs and a priority

KeywordService.description: KeywordService provides all functions needed to get, store and match keywords with their scenarios

Label.description: This is used for the interaction with alarms
Label.title: Label describes a label payload

LabelService.description: LabelService defines all required methods to interact with labels

LabelStrength.description: This payload connects labels with an amount of user for a strength
LabelStrength.title: LabelStrength describes a strength payload

amount.description: amount of strength members for a specific alarm

Login.description: Login contains a single organization's login data

LoginService.description: LoginService provides all functions needed to get and store login data for organizations

items.description: This is used for user to role assignment
items.title: Definition of a user-role payload

OrganizationService.description: OrganizationService provides all functions needed to check for expired accesses to organizations

PersonalAccessToken.description: This is used for personal access token interaction
PersonalAccessToken.title: Definition of a personal access token payload

PersonalAccessTokenRequest.description: This is used for creation of personal access tokens
PersonalAccessTokenRequest.title: Definition of a personal access token request payload

PersonalAccessTokenService.description: PersonalAccessTokenService contains all methods needed to implement our service

Position.description: Position represents a position in the alarm that is fulfilled by a user

PositionCount.description: PositionCount contains the amount and actual count of a position

PositionCountMap.description: PositionCountMap contains all counted positions in a map

additionalProperties.description: PositionCount contains the amount and actual count of a position

PostgresAlarmService.description:
PostgresAlarmService implements the methods of the AlarmService
and contains all required resources

EventService.description: EventService provides all methods needed to list and create audit-log entries

FeatureIntegration.description: FeatureIntegration contains all data used to integrate our shop with all other services

LabelService.description: LabelService defines all required methods to interact with labels

ScenarioService.description: ScenarioService defines all required methods for interacting with scenarios

and contains all required resources

PostgresOrganizationService.description: PostgresOrganizationService is our implementation of OrganizationService using a Postgres database

PostgresPersonalAccessTokenService.description: PostgresPersonalAccessTokenService is our PersonalAccessTokenService implementation using a database

PostgresScenarioService.description: PostgresScenarioService implements all required methods of the ScenarioService interface

UnitService.description: UnitService defines all methods for operations in the Unit Domain

PostgresShiftScheduleService.description: PostgresShiftScheduleService is our implementation of ShiftScheduleService

PostgresSupportAgentService.description: PostgresSupportAgentService is our implementation of SupportAgentService using a Postgres database

PostgresUnitService implements all methods of the UnitService

PropertyMap is used as container for additional data in alarms or messages
it can be stored and retrieved easily in our Postgres database

Role.description: This is used for role interaction
Role.title: Definition of a role payload

RoleAccess.description: This is used for user to role assignment

items.description: This is used for user to role assignment
items.title: Definition of a user-role payload

Scenario.description: Scenario contains all values of a scenario payload

description.description: user given description for this scenario

instructionCatalogID.description: possible id of an instruction catalog

name.description: user given name for this scenario

sendPosition.description: send position to users after alarm is closed

units.description: all units by their ID in an array

ScenarioCreationRequest.description: ScenarioCreationRequest contains the a creation request of a scenario

description.description: user given description for this scenario

instructionCatalogID.description: possible id of an instruction catalog

name.description: user given name for this scenario

sendPosition.description: send position to users after alarm is closed

units.description: all units by their ID in an array

ScenarioService.description: ScenarioService defines all required methods for interacting with scenarios

Service.description: This is used for service interaction
Service.title: Definition of a service payload

Shift.description: Shift describes the intervals of a shift and the assigned users all user defined parameters

ShiftSchedule.description: ShiftSchedule contains meta-information about the schedule and multiple shifts

items.description: Shift describes the intervals of a shift and the assigned users all user defined parameters

ShiftScheduleService.description: ShiftScheduleService defines all methods used to manage shift schedules

Strength.description: This is used for the strength interaction
Strength.title: Strength describes the strength payload

amount.description: amount of strength members for a specific alarm

labelStrengths.description: label with amount for this strength

StrengthConfig.description: StrengthConfig describes a strength configuration payload

labels.description: assigned label ids for this rank

SupportAgentResponse.description: SupportAgentResponse contains whether the user is a support agent or not

SupportAgentService.description: SupportAgentService provides all functions needed to manage support agents

SupportOrganization.description: SupportOrganization represents a single organization and the timestamp when it allowed support agents to access it

SupportOrganizationList.description: A SupportOrganizationList contains multiple SupportOrganizations and a TotalSupportOrganization count used for pagination

items.description: SupportOrganization represents a single organization and the timestamp when it allowed support agents to access it

Token.description: This is used for token interaction
Token.title: Definition of a token payload

TokenRequest.description: This is used for creation of tokens
TokenRequest.title: Definition of a token request payload

Unit.description: This is used for the unit interactions
Unit.title: Unit describes an unit payload

organizationID.description: connected organization by the organization ID

unitParts.description: assigned unit parts for labels and their amounts

UnitCreationRequest.description: This is used for the unit creation dialog
UnitCreationRequest.title: UnitCreationRequest describes an unit creation payload

description.description: user given description for this unit

name.description: user given name for this unit

unitParts.description: assigned unit parts for labels and their amounts

items.description: This is used for the unit creation dialog and unit parts inside the unit creation payload
items.title: UnitPartCreationRequest describes an unit part creation payload

amount.description: Amount of users for the defined label

UnitPart.description: This is used for the unit parts inside the unit payload
UnitPart.title: UnitPart describes an unit part payload

UnitPartCreationRequest.description: This is used for the unit creation dialog and unit parts inside the unit creation payload
UnitPartCreationRequest.title: UnitPartCreationRequest describes an unit part creation payload

amount.description: Amount of users for the defined label

UnitService.description: UnitService defines all methods for operations in the Unit Domain

User.description: User is a basic copy of user-service's PublicUser

UserLabels.description: UserLabels contains all labels for this userID

UserRole.description: This is used for user to role assignment
UserRole.title: Definition of a user-role payload
